node.html: As data science and machine learning practitioners, we often find ourselves exploring diverse datasets to build and enhance our models. Kaggle, a hub for data enthusiasts, offers a plethora of datasets that can be invaluable for our projects. To streamline this process, the Kaggle API presents an efficient way to access your account. In this project I have built an automation for data acquisition using python to interact with Kaggle API.

Neovim, a popular and extensible text editor, has gained a significant following for its powerful capabilities and flexibility. The expansion in roster of installed plugins can slow loading times during startup. In this project, we delve into the intriguing task of analyzing Neovim plugin loading times using Python.

This project focuses on classifying heart disease based on various medical attributes such as age, sex, chest pain type, blood pressure, cholesterol level, and more. I have explored several machine learning models to predict the presence or absence of heart disease, including Decision Trees, Random Forest, XGBoost, and Logistic Regression.
